Hero.text: SOFTWARE ENGINEER, FULLSTACK DEVELOPER & CMS MANAGER

Expertise.description1: Experienced in both functional and OOP: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript. Has experience in Django, DRF, REST APIs
Expertise.description2: Passionate about UI/UX. Over 4 years of development experience in HTML, CSS, JS, React and NextJS frameworks
Expertise.description3: Worked with production ready frameworks and CMS Applications as Tilda, Joomla, Wordpress and Webflow

Work.descriptionWork: Ambitious own SaaS project witch was presented on AstanaHub DigitalMediaDay. Project developed with React, NextJS, Django, PostgreSQL. Main idea is helping companies working with PDF documents. Project on Beta Testing Phase

Career.description1: Worked as a Web Designer. MockUp, styled, Designed commercial static web sites.
Career.description2: Analyzation of the IT infrastructure. Worked with data, vizuialized it regarding Python, VBA, Power BI
Career.description3: Analyzed, projected, developed SaaS (HR) products of the company.
Career.description4: Working by own, collaboration with other teams. Web Development, Databases, Chat Bots, Data Vizualization

Contact.text2: Have an exciting project you need help with Send me an email or contact me via instant message!

Testimonials.text1: I have had the immense pleasure of collaborating with Toimet Murat on multiple projects, and I can confidently attest to his exceptional skills and proficiency in NextJS, React, Django, Python, and Tailwind. Murat possess a rare combination of technical expertise and creativity that sets him apart in the industry. His mastery of NextJS and React enables him to create highly efficient and engaging front-end interfaces. He has an impressive ability to bring designs to life, making the user experience seamless and visually appealing.
Testimonials.text2: Murat is AMAZING! If you have any doubt about hiring him, ask me - I am really impressed by this guy!
Testimonials.text3: Working with Murat was a game-changer for our project. His expertise in Web Development elevated our platform, delivering a seamless, visually stunning, and highly functional web application that exceeded our expectations.

project1.label: E-store DE'COLE
project1.description: E-store made in about 3 month. Store has 2 services: Admin dashboard and e-store itself. Admin dashboard has an API for communicate with store. Admin Dashboard made with Shadcn-UI. Database is on cloud PascaleDB (MySQL). For image store and edit used Cloudinary. Admin server can change background color, billboard, assets, products list, sizes, colors of assets in Store server. UPDATE: On Development, new requires
